cache_data

sample_from_spreadsheet

 sample_from_spreadsheet (url:str='https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/
                          1F3-
                          gMc8J57UBUo2DTsvVU7C1U1uncEpXmzE13DKwGQQ/edit#gi
                          d=1444336398', n_samples:int=10, title:str='',
                          row_spacing:int=5, first_n_columns:int=1)


df = cache_data(
    url="https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1F3-gMc8J57UBUo2DTsvVU7C1U1uncEpXmzE13DKwGQQ/edit#gid=1444336398",
    timedelta=pd.Timedelta(0.5, unit='hour'),
    keeplast=3,
    cleanup=True,
)


df2 = sample_from_spreadsheet()
